title: Readout of the President’s Day – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
March 19, 2017
Today, President Donald J. Trump held meetings regarding North Korea and China. President Trump also met with military personnel. He spoke to President Michelle Bachelet of Chile to discuss our bilateral relationship, including our close cooperation on trade and security issues. President Trump expressed concern over the situation in Venezuela, and the leaders agreed on the importance of advancing democratic principles throughout the Western Hemisphere.
